data.name: Marble Smashers
data.detailed_description:
Marble Smashers is an accessible 3D fighting game for 2-4 players where the goal is to knock out your opponents off the stage and be the last one standing. You must attack other opponents to knock them away, but watch out! The more you get attacked, the easier it is to be thrown off. In each stage, you may find objects that help you with your objective.

Features

  • Local multiplayer for 2-4 players
  • Various unique stages to choose from

In each stage, you may find objects that help you with your objective.

Features

data.short_description: Marble Smashers is an accessible 3D fighting game for 2-4 players where the goal is to knock out your opponents off the stage and be the last one standing. Do what you must with your limited moveset and stage objects to ensure your victory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7600K @ 3.50 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9700 @ 3.60 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements not final
